name: BLACK+DECKER Flip Waffle Maker, WM1404S, 7" Round Belgian Waffles, Ready Light Indicator
short_description: Fabric Type: Metal Rotate and Cook System - A simple flip gets you perfect, even-cooked waffles Handle Lock - The cool-touch handle locks the plates shut to prevent dripping during cooking Ready Indicator Light - Know exactly when the waffle maker is ready to cook

name: Hamilton Beach Belgian Waffle Maker with PFAS-Free Non-Stick Ceramic-Coated Plates, Browning Control, Indicator Lights, Stainless Steel (26081)
short_description: Create quick and easy waffles at home. With the Hamilton Beach Ceramic Belgian Waffle Maker, you'll make restaurant-quality Belgian waffles in minutes. Quickly serve delicious, golden-brown waffles hot off the grids. Four times more durable than traditional nonstick. The Durathon ceramic nonstick grids on this waffle iron are four times more durable than traditional nonstick, won’t crack or peel, and are PFAS free. Perfectly browned waffles with adjustable browning control. From light to dark, you have total control of how your waffles come out. Whatever shade you pick, you’ll get waffles that are golden brown on the outside and fluffy on the inside. Easy-clean nonstick grids. There's no need to worry about your waffles sticking to the grids. After cooking, the nonstick grids release waffles for easy removal and clean up quickly with a simple wipe of a damp sponge or cloth. Compact, upright storage. This small waffle maker stores upright, making it easy to tuck away on your shelf or in a cabinet when not in use.
product_description: Enjoy fresh, fluffy waffles with the Hamilton Beach Belgian waffle maker. With adjustable browning control and nonstick, easy-clean plates, you can create restaurant-quality results at home with effortless cleanup.

name: Waffle Maker, Round Classic Belgian Waffle Iron with 180°Rotating Design, Nonstick Plates & Cool Touch Handle, 1080W Fast Heating Waffle Machine, Brushed Stainless, Silver (4 Slices)
short_description: Thick Fluffy Waffles: With the ability to flip waffles during cooking, the Reemix Removable-Grid Belgian Waffle Maker lets you create thick, fluffy waffles. Say goodbye to frozen waffles and enjoy fresh Belgian waffles anytime. 1080W Fast Heat: High-efficiency Double-Sided baking waffle plates contribute to a superior and faster cooking process. Making up to 4 waffles in just 6 minutes, so you can enjoy a delicious breakfast even on busy mornings. 180°Rotating System: The rotating Belgian waffle maker‘s convenient 180° flip system allows the batter to fully coat the cooking plates for even heat distribution, so you end up with evenly-cooked fluffy waffles, browned on both the top and the bottom with no bald spots. EASY CLEANING & STORAGE: Extra-strong non-stick coating for easy cleaning; gently wipe down the exterior and interior plates with a damp cloth. Can be stored in vertical position for easy space-saving storage. PERFECT KITCHEN GIFT: An ideal gift for housewarming, Thanksgiving, Christmas or wedding. 1 YEAR WARRANTY and 12 hours customer support team means you can buy with confidence. If you have any question about our product, just feel free to contact us.

name: Chefman Rotating Belgian Waffle Maker, 180° Flip Iron w/ Non-Stick Plates, Adjustable Timer, Locking Lid, & Drip Plate, Space Saving Storage, Mess-Free Breakfast, Stainless Steel/Black
short_description: PERFECT WAFFLES: Extra thick non-stick waffle plates will help you easily remove your waffles without damaging them to create deliciously perfect restaurant-style waffles every time; allowing you to take on even more fruit, ice cream, syrup and endless delicious toppings. The 180-degree rotating design spreads the batter evenly throughout the iron, so you end up with fluffy, perfectly cooked Belgian waffles with a crispy golden exterior. 180 DEGREE ROTATING DESIGN: The rotating Belgian waffle maker s convenient flip system allows the batter to fully coat the cooking plates, which is important for evenly cooked waffles. To create light and fluffy waffles or waffles with a crispier texture, simply adjust the temperature. ADJUSTABLE TIMER: Adjustable browning control dial gives you flexibility to create waffles just as you like them. Set the timer to a lower setting for more fluffy waffles and a higher setting for a darker, crispier waffle. EASY CLEAN AND SPACE SAVING: When finished, the drip tray removes easily for quick cleanup. Just wash with a mild dishwashing soap and rinse with Warm water. The appliance can be stored vertically to help save counter or cabinet space. RESOURCES: cETL approved with advanced safety technology for long lasting durability, and 1-year warranty provided by Chefman, so you can purchase worry-free - we've got your back. For information on how to use your product, scroll down for a PDF User Guide. 1080 Watts/120 Volts
product_description: Indulge in perfect restaurant-style Belgian waffles with extra deep pockets for even more fruit, ice cream, syrup and endless delicious toppings! The Chefman Rotating Belgian Waffle Maker has a convenient flip system which allows the batter to fully coat the cooking plates, resulting in evenly cooked waffles. Whether you prefer light and fluffy waffles or waffles with a crispier texture, simply adjust the temperature dial for your desired results. Extra thick non-stick waffle plates will help you easily remove your waffles without damaging them - no need for cooking spray! When finished, easily remove the drip tray for quick cleanup and store it vertically to help save on counter or cabinet space.

name: bella Classic Rotating Belgian Waffle Maker with Nonstick Plates, Removable Drip Tray, Adjustable Browning Control and Cool Touch Handles, Stainless Steel
short_description: VERSATILE COOKING: With 3 different non-stick coatings, from traditional to ceramic titanium, this waffle iron allows you to cook up a variety of scrumptious treats beyond just waffles. From pancakes to hash browns, let your culinary creativity soar! FAMILY-SIZED DELIGHT: The large capacity of this rotating waffle maker ensures that you can make plenty of delicious Belgian waffles to feed your family and guests. Start your morning with a hot, fresh batch of perfectly golden, fluffy deliciousness! FLIPPING PERFECT: The rotating function of this double waffle maker guarantees even cooking and with 9 browning control settings you're sure to get the dessert of your dreams every time. Plus, the cool-touch handle makes flipping a breeze EASY CLEANUP: Say goodbye to messy batter and hello to easy cleanup with smooth auto-lock cooking surfaces and a dishwasher safe removable drip tray. The non-slip feet keep our waffle irons securely in place, protecting your countertop from any spills ELEGANT & COMPACT: The sleek design and folding handle make our cute waffle makers the perfect fit for any kitchen decor, plus the compact size makes them easy to store away. They're also a great gift idea and a nice addition to your wedding registry
product_description: Love waffles? Same. The bella Classic Waffle Iron Toaster delivers crispy, mouthwatering waffles faster than you can eat them (in 6 minutes to be exact). Power up this rotating waffle maker to streamline the morning dash to school, work or whatever else your busy day has in store. It has 9 precise browning settings for a custom cook and the rotating function with cool-touch handle allows you to cook evenly with a flip of the wrist. Plus, the nonstick coating makes the bella waffle iron easy to clean with just a damp cloth. The built-in power and ready indicator lights let you know when the waffle maker is hot, and the extra deep pockets cook up waffles perfect for a variety of toppings, such as fresh berries, melted butter, ice cream and maple syrup. The cool-touch handles and locking latch make it safe and easy to store, while the compact design allows you to stand it up vertically to save space. Plus, the dual PFOA-free and nonstick surfaces result in fluffy and tender waffles that are crispy on the outside and golden brown on the inside.

name: Waffle Maker, 1400W Belgian Waffle Maker, Double Waffle Iron 180° Flip, Rotating Nonstick Plates, Adjustable Browning Control, Locking Buckle & Cool Touch Handle, Removable Drip Tray, Stainless Steel
short_description: 【STAINLESS STEEL WAFFLE MAKER】This double-layer waffle maker is newly upgraded and made of stainless steel, which is scratch-resistant, long-lasting, durable and easy to clean. With a special 180°flip cooking system spreads the batter evenly throughout the waffle machine, so you end up with fluffy, perfectly cooked Belgian waffles with a crispy golden exterior. 【DOUBLE BELGIAN WAFFLE IRON】Novalife belgian waffle maker features a double-layer design that bakes 2 large traditional-style Belgian waffles at once, with 8 quarter slices and extra-deep waffle pockets. Make plenty of delicious Belgian waffles at once to satisfy your family and guests. 【1400W QUADRUPLE-SIDED HEATING】1400W High Power and Two sets of high-efficiency Double-Sided baking waffle plates contribute to a superior and faster cooking process. Making up to 8 waffles in just 6 minutes, so you can enjoy a delicious breakfast even on busy mornings. 【PERFECTLY BROWNED WAFFLES】From light to dark, you have total control of how your waffles come out(by turning the Browning Control Knob) . Whatever shade you pick, you’ll get waffles that are golden brown on the outside and fluffy on the inside. 【EASY TO USE】Dual indicator lights on the front of the stuffed waffle maker let you know exactly when the unit is preheated and ready to cook; the cool-touch handles are easy to hold, lock, and flip; the nonstick plates and the removable drip tray for an easy clean-up 【EASY TO CLEAN】The durable nonstick coating plates release the waffles easily without sticking or tearing, easy to clean with just a damp cloth. Say goodbye to messy batter with a dishwasher safe removable drip tray. The non-slip feet keep our waffle irons securely in place. 【COMPACT DESIGN】Our waffle iron has a sleek design that makes it perfect fit for any kitchen decor, plus the compact size makes it easy to store away and no clutter more consisten. Feel free to get touch with us if you have any question, 24 months after-sales service and 24/7 friendly customer service are provided

product_description: Cook up to four fluffy, golden waffles at once with this easy-to-use iron for belgian waffles. The nonstick surface releases food effortlessly and makes cleaning a breeze. The built-in power and ready indicator lights let you know when the double waffle maker is hot, and the extra deep pockets accommodate a variety of toppings, such as fresh berries, melted butter, ice cream and maple syrup. The cool-touch handles and locking latch make it safe and easy to store, while the compact design allows you to stand it up vertically to save space. Plus, the dual PFOA-free and nonstick surfaces result in fluffy and tender waffles that are crispy on the outside and golden brown on the inside. So why not try making panini, hash browns, or even biscuit pizzas in your new cute waffle maker? You won’t be disappointed!

name: Gourmia Belgian Waffle Maker – Nonstick Waffle Ceramic Coating Plates with Browning Control &Indicator Lights to Make Thick Fluffy Waffles from Light to Dark - Compact, Quick Heat Up, Upright Storage
short_description: Create Perfect Belgian Waffles in Minutes – The Gourmia Ceramic Belgian Waffle Maker delivers thick, fluffy waffles with deep pockets for syrup, fruit, and toppings. The quick heat-up ensures fast, even cooking. Durable Ceramic Nonstick Coating – The PFAS-free ceramic coating is 4x more durable than traditional nonstick, ensuring waffles release easily and cleanup is effortless with just a quick wipe. Adjustable Browning Control for Customized Crispiness – Choose from light to dark browning levels to create crispy, golden waffles on the outside and soft, fluffy texture inside. Perfect for every waffle preference. Compact & Upright Storage for Small Kitchens – The space-saving design allows upright storage, making it ideal for small kitchens, dorms, and cabinets while providing restaurant-quality results at home. Indicator Lights & Easy Cleanup for Stress-Free Mornings – The ready-to-cook light ensures proper preheating, while the ceramic nonstick grids release waffles easily for a quick cleanup with no mess.
